Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory618.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "Chiko's squad was heading toward the administrative room...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bianca is explaining the information she retrieved through the Phantom Tracer to her team when a call to her terminal suddenly interrupts her.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'How was the Phantom Tracer, Stigmata?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A pale face appears in the comms interface.'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'We just finished running it for the first time.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "I'll upload the relevant data after the mission. Please do not interrupt our operation unprompted again.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "I believe I've mentioned that to you before, Vesalius.", 4: '2'}
{3: "Vesalius sneers at Bianca's words, showing no desire to terminate her call."}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "I see. I'll upload the data now.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The tracer only ran briefly, but it generated more data than expected. The upload is progressing slowly.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vesalius', 3: 'Right. Are you the Gray Raven Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The pale female figure turns her gaze toward you while she waits for the data transfer to complete.'}
{2: 'Vesalius', 3: 'I heard you directly connected your Mind Beacon to a Corrupted in a previous mission.', 4: '1'}
{2: "That's right.", 3: '34'}
{2: 'Vesalius', 3: "Hah. No wonder they were so confident and didn't even bother to arrange a recovering plan for you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vesalius', 3: "You're certainly much more capable than the last Gray Raven Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vesalius', 3: "How did the Deep M.I.N.D. connection with Stigmata feel? Is there any difference to repairing Empyrea's—it's Eclipse now, isn't it—M.I.N.D.?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Their names are Bianca and Liv.', 3: '40'}
{3: 'For some reason, Vesalius seems inclined to call Constructs by the codenames of their frames instead of their actual names.'}
{3: 'She grins mockingly, seemingly having thought of something.'}
{2: 'Vesalius', 3: 'Singing the same tune, are we?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vesalius', 3: '"A familiar appearance would help stabilize the M.I.N.D..."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vesalius', 3: '"Recognizing your own face will keep the M.I.N.D. from deviating..."', 4: '1'}
{3: "Vesalius' smile grows ever more sarcastic."}
{2: 'Vesalius', 3: 'I thought someone who spent every day and night with Constructs would stop fooling themselves at some point.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vesalius', 3: 'Should I commend you for being the "hero" the Parliament meticulously "adorned"? Have those pretty "ribbons" ensnared your critical thinking?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vesalius', 3: 'If it\'s foolish to think that "Constructs are mere tools," it\'s equally foolish to think that "Constructs are just humans."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vesalius', 3: 'A perfect body, a controlled path of evolution, and an independent mind...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vesalius', 3: 'Constructs are a new life form. They are the next step of the evolution.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "But that doesn't mean we need to abandon or deny who we were.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia suddenly speaks up from aside.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vesalius', 3: "Perhaps your name meant a lot to your past as a human, but your frame's codename is what anchors you in this new form of life. It's unwise to avoid it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vesalius', 3: "You keep telling yourself you're human, but you wield powers a human can only dream of. This discrepancy can't be swept away with a few pretty words.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vesalius', 3: "The main reason for M.I.N.D. deviation is the disconnection between your self and reality. How do you remain yourself if you won't confront your distinctions?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Purifying Force Member', 3: 'Are you dressing like a nun to take the deserters to heaven? You should be sending them to hell!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vesalius', 3: 'Know you as who you are, not who you were when you were a human.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vesalius', 3: 'None of them has been a human for a very...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bianca interrupts Vesalius from finishing what she has to say.'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'The data has been uploaded. Please complete your assessment quickly. We still have work to do.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{2: 'Vesalius', 3: 'Tch... Fine.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Vesalius' projection goes silent as if reading something. She soon furrows her brows."}
{2: 'Vesalius', 3: "The shorter-than-benchmark runtime wasn't unexpected. You weren't our first choice, after all.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She reads a few more pages and gets increasingly displeased.'}
{2: 'Vesalius', 3: "The hallucinations appeared immediately afterward... That data doesn't seem to be completely useless.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vesalius', 3: "It's surprising and fascinating, but it also proves that your M.I.N.D. was deviating before your hallucinations appeared.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vesalius', 3: 'You should heed my warning, Stigmata.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vesalius', 3: "Eliminating the Punishing Virus isn't the only way forward. The Phantom Tracer was made to decipher the data within the Punishing Virus.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vesalius', 3: 'To utilize a weapon of the Punishing Virus half-heartedly in your half-hearted form will only create a greater disconnection within yourself.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "I'll think about what you said when needed.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{2: 'Vesalius', 3: "You'll still run into these hallucinations later, anyway.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vesalius', 3: 'I look forward to the data these unanticipated phenomena provide.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vesalius', 3: "Remember to stabilize her M.I.N.D. with a Deep M.I.N.D. connection in time. I don't want my work to become something one-and-done.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vesalius', 3: 'Not that we have more tissues from the Hetero-Hive Mother to make another Phantom Tracer.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vesalius disappears from the projection after she ends the call.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "She's the lead researcher from Kurono I mentioned before, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'She was also one of the lead creators of Stigmata.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'What is that "warning" she mentioned?', 3: '113'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "This coating wasn't what the Stigmata frame looked like. The original form... leans more toward the stereotypes of the Purifying Force and witches...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'But considering that a familiar appearance can help stabilize the M.I.N.D., we made this coating in response to the short production time of the frame.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "This wasn't part of the plan...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bianca seems to think of something right as she says that. A rare hint of hesitation flashes across her eyes, but it quickly disappears, replaced by her usual determination.'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'We took too long to upload that data, Commandant. We should proceed with our mission.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A hastily made frame, a temporary coating, a replacement for the top candidate... you have more or less understood what happened from their conversation.'}
{3: 'But if Bianca is not willing to talk about it, you should just let it be for now.'}
{2: 'Alright.'}
{3: 'You start hearing the echoes of muddled footsteps within the aquarium.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{3: 'From the depth of the unseen underground, the hospitable "staff" are ready to "welcome" you.'}
